Description.p:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent all aspects of a persons mobility, including information on falls, mobility aids and equipment, mobility capabilities and limitations.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Mobility subset with subset original id 6001000000138.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
